title: CANAL ORB / faln at night
description: idiot doom spiral story reaction orb -- the faln rider (not) appearing at the canal at night.

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "The Headless FALN Rider -- he could..."
dialogueTree.text: The Headless FALN Rider -- he could appear at any minute!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Please tell me we're not here to l..."
links.text: "Please tell me we're not here to look for a headless man in a tracksuit riding a horse... because there's no such thing."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Don't listen to the lieutenant! He..."
links.text: Don't listen to the lieutenant! He doesn't know *anything*.

links.title: You: ""How would you know?""
links.text: "How would you know?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No one's actually *seen* the Headl..."
links.text: "No one's actually *seen* the Headless FALN Rider because he doesn't exist. He's an urban legend. A *legend*, meaning a story that's not real."

links.title: You: ""We'll just wait and see.""
links.text: "We'll just wait and see."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's nothing to wait for. We sh..."
links.text: "There's nothing to wait for. We should get some rest, it's been a long day."

links.title: You: ""I'm just going to wait a few more..."
links.text: "I'm just going to wait a few more minutes, just in case."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yes, stay! What's a few more minute..."
links.text: Yes, stay! What's a few more minutes going to hurt?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant has his arms crossed..."
links.text: The lieutenant has his arms crossed, fingers tapping against his bicep. "There, we waited. Nothing happened. Happy now?"

links.title: You: "There's nothing here -- You lied to..."
links.text: There's nothing here -- You lied to me!

links.title: Inland Empire: "Your ears hum from the silence insi..."
links.text: Your ears hum from the silence inside your mind...

links.title: You: ""This has made me unspeakably unhap..."
links.text: "This has made me unspeakably unhappy."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I know myths and legends are entic..."
links.text: "I know myths and legends are enticing, but in the end they're just stories for children... to teach them lessons, or to frighten them." He gestures toward the waves.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go. It's very late -- we sho..."
links.text: "Let's go. It's very late -- we should be resting already. Tomorrow will be another tough day."

links.title: You: ""You were right, Kim. What was I th..."
links.text: "You were right, Kim. What was I thinking? Let's go." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""You're right, what was I thinking?..."
links.text: "You're right, what was I thinking? Let's go." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods."
links.text: The lieutenant nods.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, you're right. Would've been..."
links.text: "Yeah, you're right. Would've been cool, though, don't you think?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, it would have been *very* coo..."
links.text: "Yes, it would have been *very* cool." The lieutenant nods. "Now let's get some rest."

links.title: You: ""No, we're just passing through.""
links.text: "No, we're just passing through."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good. It's late, we should get som..."
links.text: "Good. It's late, we should get some rest."

links.title: You: ""Absolutely not. That's not why we'..."
links.text: "Absolutely not. That's not why we're here. Why would you even think that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We've been running around together..."
links.text: "We've been running around together doing *odd things* for days. I've seen how your mind operates... this is just the sort of thing it would latch on to."

links.title: You: ""I admit... it is a thing I would *..."
links.text: "I admit... it is a thing I would *usually* do. But not this time."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good. It's already late, we need t..."
links.text: "Good. It's already late, we need to get some rest. Tomorrow will be another tough day."

links.title: You: ""Okay, you got me. I had a hope...""
links.text: "Okay, you got me. I had a hope..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...a foolish hope. But it's okay...."
links.text: "...a foolish hope. But it's okay. I get it. It would have been *cool*." The lieutenant nods. "Now let's get some rest."
